Comments_List: I know every insect family ever.

The field trip was great.

But there was a lot of memorization. I think it would be more useful to focus on the functional diversity of the families than memorizing Latin names of the families. I think making our collection focused on functional traits and feeding habits would arguably be more useful for the goals of the project than the current 90 families.
It is a lot of work for only half credit. I would only take it if you are certain you have time.
